headline: Faircourt Asset Management Inc. Announces Distribution Increase for the Shares of Faircourt Gold Income Corp.
summary: Toronto, Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Faircourt Asset Management Inc., as Manager of Faircourt Gold Income Corp (CBOE:FGX), based on strong NAV growth achieved over the past year, is pleased to announce an increase of 41.67% in the monthly distribution for the Class A Shares of the corporation, beginning with the January distribution. Faircourt FundsTrading SymbolDistribution Amount (per share/unit)Ex-Dividend DateRecord DatePayable Date Faircourt Gold Income Corp.FGX $0.034January 30, 2026

content.summary: Toronto, Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Faircourt Asset Management Inc., as Manager of Faircourt Gold Income Corp (CBOE:FGX), based on strong NAV growth achieved over the past year, is pleased to announce an increase of 41.67% in the monthly distribution for the Class A Shares of the corporation, beginning with the January distribution.
